quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. Your first objective is to make an attempt to travel west. Once you do that, make an effort to go to the south. With that done, try to travel south. If you can accomplish that, take a trip east. And then, go north. With that done, retrieve the type S keycard from the rack. And then, assure that the type S chest is unlocked. Then, make it so that the type S chest in the laundromat is opened. And then, recover the latchkey from the type S chest in the laundromat. After that, lock the box with the latchkey. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: take type S keycard from rack
unlock type S chest with type S keycard
take latchkey from type S chest
take type S keycard from rack
unlock type S chest with type S keycard
take latchkey from type S chest

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundromat. An usual one.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a box. You wonder idly who left that here.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a type S chest![if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The type S chest contains [a list of things in the c_1]![end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The type S chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a dresser. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_2]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The dresser is empty![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the rack you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. This always happens![end if] You can make out a bench. Now why would someone leave that there? [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a studio. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
I am stoked to announce that you are now in the pantry. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a chest.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

walkthrough: take type S keycard from rack
unlock type S chest with type S keycard
take latchkey from type S chest

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! Your first objective is to venture west. Following that, move south. After that, make an effort to head south. Once you accomplish that, go to the east. If you can succeed at that, attempt to venture north. And then, recover the type S keycard from the rack within the laundromat. If you can get your hands on the type S keycard, unlock the type S chest. After that, open the type S chest inside the laundromat. And then, retrieve the latchkey from the type S chest within the laundromat. If you can get your hands on the latchkey, lock the box with the latchkey. And once you've done that, you win!
